original_title: Bob Harper: Inside Out Method - Body Rev Cardio Conditioning
overview: Your heart is the most vital muscle in your body; the engine that keeps you alive.  In this ultimate cardio workout, Bob takes you through a series of explosive, non-stop drills in all three planes of motion that get your heart rate pumping to maximum fat-burning capacity.  Optimize your powerhouse, and defy limitations, with a calorie-igniting, weight-loss-fueling workout.  Increase energy and enhance endurance, so you blaze away fat and transform your body!
tagline: Heart-pounding, calorie-smashing, intense cardio weight loss
title: Bob Harper: Inside Out Method - Body Rev Cardio Conditioning
